name: Animated webflow-like hover interactions in Figma
description:
Hi!


I made this file covering some interactions that you can do in Webflow.


I was following this video (award winning animation) and I tried to simplify the way you can do animated interactions in Figma.


Here is the Dribbble shot


Duplicate it and let me know what you think. If you liked, show some support ❤️
